name: crumbs
description:
I wanted to create a simple recipe just using the Capella silverline flavours Iâ€™ve kept it simple to let these 3 shine.
This simple recipe is a crumbly biscuit with added texture and glue formed from using using whipped marshmallow then add some sugar cinnamon on top and you have a perfect baked biscuit.
Only additional flavour was some much needed sweetener.
Simple but creative I hope you enjoy it as much as me.
author: dazcole

reviews.text: I'm not normally a cinnamon enjoyer...but that SL cinnamon sugar hits my spot.  This recipe makes a damn good cookie that's not overspiced
